text: My son has lesson with Coach Ivan for 3 years. He is patient and understands my sonâ€™s needs and challenges in learning tennis. My son always looks forward to have lessons with Coach Ivan no matter how busy he is with school work. Thanks Ivan.

Roger is a friendly and patient coach, right from the first lesson to the last lesson. My friend and I enjoyed the lessons with Roger as he provides constructive feedback as needed, and shares ways we can improve on the sport. We will definitely get in touch with Roger again should we pursue advanced lessons!
Coach Roger is friendly, patient and professional. We have learnt a lot of basic skills from him and also enjoyed every lesson with him. Highly recommended for beginners who are interested in tennis.

We learned a lot from coach Roger, he is very friendly and patient to teach us the basics of tennis as all of us were playing for the first time. Highly recommended for people who want to learn tennis.
